com.camerontec.catalys.server.ha.collections.registry

Interface IDistributedCollectionRegistry

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICollectionRegistry
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistributedCollectionRegistry

    public interface IDistributedCollectionRegistry
extends ICollectionRegistry
    Extends ICollectionRegistry with:
    • Methods used to trigger the synchronization of collections in the registry,
    • the ability to report loss of synchronization for any distributed collection in the registry or the registry itself.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDistributedCollectionRegistrySynchronizationListener(IDistributedCollectionRegistrySynchronizationListener listener)
      Registers a listener to be notified when synchronization is lost for the registry itself.
      void addDistributedCollectionSynchronizationListener(IDistributedCollectionSynchronizationListener listener)
      Registers a listener to be notified when synchronization is lost for a given distributed collection.
      Set<String> distributedCollectionNames() 
      void removeDistributedCollectionRegistrySynchronizationListener(IDistributedCollectionRegistrySynchronizationListener listener)
      Unregisters a distributed collection registry synchronization listener.
      void removeDistributedCollectionSynchronizationListener(IDistributedCollectionSynchronizationListener listener)
      Unregisters a distributed collection synchronization listener.
      void setProcessingReplayResponsesListener(IProcessingReplayResponsesListener processingReplayResponsesListener)
      Sets a listener to be notified when replay response is processed.
      void synchronize(Iterable<ClusterNode> nodes)
      Synchronizes the contents of the registry against the given cluster nodes.
      void synchronize(String collectionName, Iterable<ClusterNode> nodes)
      Synchronizes a collection against the given cluster nodes.

    • Method Detail

      • synchronize

        void synchronize(Iterable<ClusterNode> nodes)
          throws SynchronizationException
        Synchronizes the contents of the registry against the given cluster nodes.
        Parameters:
        nodes - the ordered sequence of cluster nodes against which to synchronize
        Throws:
        SynchronizationException - if synchronization fails

      • synchronize

        void synchronize(String collectionName,
                 Iterable<ClusterNode> nodes)
          throws IllegalArgumentException,
                 SynchronizationException
        Synchronizes a collection against the given cluster nodes.
        Parameters:
        collectionName - the name of the collection to synchronize
        nodes - the ordered sequence of cluster nodes against which to synchronize
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no collection bound to the given name in the registry
        SynchronizationException - if synchronization fails

      • addDistributedCollectionSynchronizationListener

        void addDistributedCollectionSynchronizationListener(IDistributedCollectionSynchronizationListener listener)
                                              throws IllegalArgumentException
        Registers a listener to be notified when synchronization is lost for a given distributed collection.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to register
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if listener is already registered

      • removeDistributedCollectionSynchronizationListener

        void removeDistributedCollectionSynchronizationListener(IDistributedCollectionSynchronizationListener listener)
                                                 throws IllegalArgumentException
        Unregisters a distributed collection synchronization listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to unregister
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if listener is not registered
